biotools.summary: The MIPS Fusarium graminearum Genome Database (FGDB) is a comprehensive genome database for Fusarium graminearum. The current version of FGDB v3.1 provides information on the full manually revised gene set based on the Broad Institute assembly FG3 genome sequence. The database serves as a convenient entry point to explore expression data results and to obtain information on the Affymetrix GeneChip probe sets.
